text: Alain Émile Louis Marie Poher was a French politician. He was president of the French Senate from 3 October 1968 to 1 October 1992. Because of this he was interim President of France twice. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1996 deaths Category:French Roman Catholics Category:MEPs for France Category:Presidents of France Category:Presidents of the European Parliament Category:Presidents of the Senate (France) Category:Politicians from Île-de- France Category:People from Val-de-Marne Category:20th-century heads of state of France
title: Alain Poher
